help.short: The name of the NetApp account

json.schema:

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the NetApp account

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the NetApp account
The geo-location where the resource lives
Resource tags.
The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive): Microsoft.NetApp, Microsoft.KeyVault
The name of KeyVault key.
The resource ID of KeyVault.
The Uri of KeyVault.
ClientId of the multi-tenant AAD Application. Used to access cross-tenant keyvaults.
The ARM resource identifier of the user assigned identity used to authenticate with key vault. Applicable if identity.type has 'UserAssigned'. It should match key of identity.userAssignedIdentities.
Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.activeDirectories[].backupOperators" options="backup-operators">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.activeDirectories[].securityOperators" options="security-operators">
